description: A man leads an agitation against corrupt politicians and an unethical businessman whose factory has released toxic gas into the air.
Working as a taxi driver, Ganesh leads a peaceful life. One day, on helping the police seize three criminals, he incurs the wrath of a criminal network, following which his real identity is revealed.
star: Ajith Kumar, Shruti Haasan and Lakshmi Menon

description: Kolaigaran is a 2019 Indian Tamil-language action thriller film directed by Andrew Louis of Leelai fame. The film stars Arjun Sarja, Vijay Antony and Ashima Narwal in the main lead roles, while Nassar and Seetha play supportive roles.
star: Arjun Sarja, Vijay Antony and Ashima Narwal

description: M S Dhoni, a boy from Ranchi, aspires to play cricket for India. Though he initially tries to please his father by working for the Indian Railways, he ultimately decides to chase his dreams.
A former player finds a renewed sense of purpose when he returns to the hockey field.
A former player finds a renewed sense of purpose when he returns to the hockey field.
star: Hiphop Tamizha Adhi and Vijay Kumar

description: Maaran, a doctor, is falsely arrested for the murder of his colleague, Dr Arjun Zachariah. He soon discovers that the real culprit is a lookalike who aims to expose corruption in the medical industry.
star: Vijay, Nithya Menen, Samantha, and Kajal Aggarwal

description: Bhaskaran, a college dropout, along with his friend Nallathambi, starts a coaching class for students in order to win the love of a young professor, Chandrika.
Shiva has a good job and lives with his family but it all changes when his brother is killed by a gangster. While the meek Shiva makes a plan to avenge his brother, his father too makes his own plan.
A mahout and his elephant earn a livelihood by performing in temples. However, when they visit a village, the responsibility of protecting the villagers from a wild elephant falls on their shoulder.
star: Vikram Prabhu, Lakshmi Menon, Thambi Ramayya

description: Shiva, an unemployed graduate, falls in love with Charu. However, when on Charu's request, he drives her to Mumbai, the two are chased down by two different gangs for different reasons.
A scientist invents a time-travelling watch, which his evil twin brother wants to get hold of. Years later, the scientist's son battles his uncle, who is still desperately in search of the watch.
star: Suriya in a triple role, along with Samantha Ruth Prabhu and Nithya Menon

description: Manohar, along with his family, moves into a new apartment on the 13th floor. However, their peace is disturbed by a spirit that uses the television set as a medium to communicate with them.
After consuming liquor, four friends decide to do something interesting and visit a haunted bungalow. However, they do not realize that they have returned home with an evil spirit.
Gautham and Deeksha, along with their daughter, move into an isolated bungalow gifted to them by Gautham's extortionist father. Soon, they start experiencing paranormal activities around the house.
star: Lakshmi Priyaa Chandramouli and Amzath Khan

description: A writer moves into a villa in Pondichery, a gift from his deceased father. He is in for a shock when he discovers old paintings by his father actually depicts events from his own life.
star: Ashok Selvan, Sanchita Shetty, Nassar, Jayakumar

description: College students Shakthi and Josesh fall in love with two sisters. When the family learns about the love affairs, they are ready to go to any length to save their honour.
star: Vijay Sethupathi, Prabhakaran, Gayathrie Shankar, and Aishwarya Rajesh

description: Two young students, Sachein and Shalini, who study in the same college deny their feelings for each other. Sachein tries different tactics to make Shalini confess her love for him.
Siva, a happy-go-lucky man, mistakes Pooja's identity and kidnaps her from her marriage hall. However, when they fall in love with each other, they find it difficult to convince their families.
Four policemen lead a happy life in a village known for its virtuousness. But they become worried when they receive a job transfer letter to another village known for its riots.
Goutham grows up hating women after his mother abandons him during his childhood. Though he decides to stay single while his friends marry, Priya changes his mind about singlehood.
star: Jiiva, Vinay, Santhanam, Trisha, Andrea, and Nassar

description: Guna kidnaps Eeswaran, brother of a minister for orchestrating violence among students. After being released, Eeswaran trails after Guna to exact his revenge.
star: Vikram Prabhu, Vamsi Krishna, Surabhi, Ganesh Venkatraman and Hariraj

description: A milkman moves to Chennai from the village and unwittingly stops a number of crimes. When a young journalist learns of this, she convinces him to become a superhero and fight for the common man.
star: Vijay, Hansika Motwani, Genelia, Saranya Mohan and Santhanam

description: After a killer fails to kill a judge, he decides to enter his house to win his family's heart. But when the family members get suspicious of him, he claims to be the judge's long-lost son.
In the kingdom of Mahishmati, Shivudu falls in love with a fair maiden. While trying to woo her, he learns about the conflict-ridden past of his family and his true legacy.
star: Prabhas, Tamanah, Sathyaraj, Nasar, Anushka, Rana and Ramya krishnan

description: John and Regina, who dislike each other, are forced to get married and lead troubled lives. However, things take a turn when the couple suffers a sudden tragedy.
star: Arya, Jai, Nayanthara, and Nazriya Nazim

description: Raghav, who changes his identity to Abu for a reserved ticket and Priya, who impersonates her Muslim friend, meet in the train and fall in love. Things change when they realize their true identities.
Jeevan, a famous fiction author, is distressed after his stories become outdated. To write a thriller, he visits a hill station where unexpectedly he gets entangled in a series of horrific events.
Karnan is a corrupt police inspector who frequently bends the rules to suit his own needs. However, he re-aligns his morals and tries to do the right thing after a life-changing event.
After his parents are brutally murdered, Rishi is on a quest to find his parents' killers. He finds that his own uncle, who has now disguised himself as Robert, is involved in the killings.
Akash, a simple villager, aspires to become famous after being rejected by a girl. However, things get complicated when he hits the agricultural minister with a stone.
Duvvada Jagannatham Sastry, a benevolent young man, tries his best to help people in need whenever an opportunity comes up. A police officer takes notice and asks him to work as a crime fighter.
star: Allu Arjun, Pooja Hegde, Rao Ramesh, Chandra Mohan

description: Charan, a software engineer, is about to get arrested for a murder when the real killer, a lookalike, is caught. When Charan hears his story, he decides to help him.
After years, politician Shankar wakes up from a coma. His son, a cop, recreates everything as would be expected by his father in order to save him from any shock. He also hunts for his father's foes.
star: Mahesh Babu and Samantha Ruth Prabhu

description: Surya, a young man, moves to Mumbai hoping to join the underworld. He forms his own gang and starts recruiting criminals and gangsters. Things take a turn when he falls in love with a cop's daughter.
When a man fixes his daughter's marriage with his brother's son, he learns that his would-be son-in-law loves someone else. As this leads to tension in the family, the son plays the peacemaker.
star: Mahesh Babu, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Kajal Aggarwal and Pranitha.

description: Krrish, a young man with superhuman abilities, falls in love with Priya and goes to Singapore to meet her. When he discovers a shocking truth about his father's death, he is forced to use his powers.
star: Hrithik Roshan, Priyanka Chopra, Rekha and Naseeruddin Shah

description: The Legend Begins is the re-imagined version by Hollywood of the film The Monkey King: Havoc in Heavens Palace, the origin and birthplace of The Monkey King Story.
star: Aaron Kwok, Him Law, Feng Shaofeng, Donnie Yen, MORE

description: With the twelve ancient animal signs in the Chinese Zodiac stolen, Asian Hawk, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. He is accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady in his mission.
Satya gets a different face after he suffers from burn injuries, but a new face multiplies his problems. His ordeal begins when he leaves the hospital and has to deal with his lover's murderer.
star: Ram Charan · Allu Arjun · Shruti Haasan · Kajal Agarwal.

description: Tintin, a young reporter, buys the model of a ship and is intrigued when his dog shows him a scroll after the toy breaks. He tells Captain Haddock and they embark on an adventure to find a shipwreck.
movieName: The Adventures of Tintin: The Secret of the Unicorn

description: Ugraputran discovers his royal origins and decides to swap places with his dumb twin brother. He exposes his evil uncle and also manages to save the kingdom from the Britishers.
Guru always helps his timid brother win accolades and promotions in his career as a policeman. But a brutal incident makes Guru realise that he needs to help his brother in another way.
star: R. Madhavan, Arya, Amala Paul, Sameera Reddy

description: Aarusaamy is a cop who believes in maintaining peace at all costs, even if it takes accepting bribes from Perumal, a crime lord. But, circumstances force him to cross the line drawn by Perumal.

Having heard numerous ghost stories as a child, Ganesh grows up to be afraid of the dark. When Ganesh moves into a new house, he gets possessed by a ghost who wants him to take revenge on its killers.
Dayalan, a teacher, tries to change the ongoing malpractices in a government school. Unfortunately, his acts are not welcomed by a few senior members and students, which leads to a rift between them.
Deepak, the CEO of a sports channel, manipulates Bhooloham and Arumugam, two boxers, for his personal gain. When Bhooloham's attack during a fight puts Arumugam in a coma, he gives up boxing.
star: Jayam Ravi, Trisha Krishnan, Prakash Raj

description: Due to a fatal accident, Krishna, a basketball player moves to a new college. There he locks horns with a Vamsi, a cricket maniac, who does not let other sports gain importance.
Eli is a sharp-witted petty thief who uses his impromptu ingenuity to carry out thefts. Seeing his unique skills, a retired cop who once rejected him at police selection, assigns him a special task.
Gopikrishna and Azhagu plan to turn a badly rundown bus into a mobile canteen. However, they must first deal with a sneaky mouse and a girl who have made the bus their home.
Kathiresan, who escapes from prison, accidentally meets his lookalike, Jeeva, who gets shot by criminals. Kathiresan masquerades as Jeeva in order to save himself, but it turns him into a crusader.
star: Vijay, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Neil Nitin Mukesh, Tota Roy Chowdhury and Sathish

description: Vishwa is a dancer in Sydney and runs a small business. He is unaware that his father is a gangster in Mumbai. When Vishwa visits India to seek his blessings for marriage, his life turns upside down.
star: Vijay , Amala Paul, Sathyaraj and Santhanam

description: Two pairs of lovers strive to come together in their respective ways. All their efforts steer them towards their goals, but fate is yet to play its hand.
When Karthi's lover, Indu, is kidnapped by her own uncle to hand her over to Paraman, a gangster, Karthi joins forces with his friend Shiva to rescue her.
Ramarajan is madly in love with Seetha. But things turn difficult for him when Aishwarya, who wants to marry Ramarajan, conspires a plan to separate Ramarajan from his girlfriend.
Shivaji, a taxi driver, leads a carefree life with his family. However, things take a turn for the worse when his niece is diagnosed with brain tumour.
Ashwin, a photojournalist, finds out that his classmate and a famous politician, Vasanthan, has links with the Naxalites. Will he manage to expose Vasanthan's treacherous motive as a politician?
When terrorists hijack a plane from Chennai, a struggle with the pilots damage the engine forcing them to make an emergency landing in Tirupati. NSG commando Ravi is entrusted with rescue operations.
star: Nagarjuna Akkineni, Prakash Raj, Sana Khaan

description: Prem encounters an accident two days before his wedding ceremony. His head injury causes him to forget the last one year of his life. His friends see to it that he gets married despite his condition.
star: Vijay Sethupathi, Gayathrie, Bagavathi Perumal, Rajkumar

description: Two fun-loving youngsters Bosepandi and his friend create a lot of nuisance to the villagers. After having fallen for the daughter of the village chief, Bosepandi needs to use his wits to marry her.
Saamy and Walter are notorious half-brothers, famous as criminals. Their lives take a sudden turn after they fall in love and must face the problems arising due to their involvement with gangsters.
After learning about the role played by his grandfather in building a dam for the villagers, Lingaa, a petty thief, reforms and commits himself to saving it from a corrupt minister.
A son sets out to look for the man responsible for his father's disappearance, which is connected to a stolen diamond. Eventually, he steals the villain's diamond and also runs away with his sister.
When an international gangster, David Billa, is killed, a police officer picks his look-alike to infiltrate the gang. Meanwhile, a woman police officer also infiltrates the gang with her own agenda.
Gandhi, a skilled con man, successfully pulls off several high-profile scams. A group of people, whom he had cheated, get together to trap him to settle the score.
During a visit to her native place, Arundhati learns that she looks like her great-grandmother, Jejamma. Soon, Jejamma's battles become her own as she fights a black magician who wants to kill her.
star: Anushka Shetty, Sonu Sood, Arjan Bajwa and Sayaji Shinde

description: A philanthropic physician runs into trouble for being too generous towards his patients. Soon he entangles himself into various situations making it difficult for him to come out of them.
Ashok, a former member of the ATS, along with Arjun, a computer hacker, and his girlfriend Anitha, tries to unveil a scam involving the bullet proof jackets provided to police officers.
star: Ajith Kumar, Arya, Nayantara and Taapsee Pannu

description: An ardent foodie who is overweight decides to join a slimming centre to attract the boy she loves. But she decides to expose the unhealthy practices the management uses to speed up weight loss.
Pannaiyar, a landlord, becomes emotionally attached to his friend's car and decides to buy it. What happens when his friend refuses to sell the car?
Rajaram, a millionaire, is cheated by his own domestic servants. When Seetha tries to stop them, they hire hitmen to kill her.
star: Jayaram, Prakash Raj, Nassar, Aravind Akash, Regina Cassandra, Saranya Mohan, Samiksha, Karunas, and Ganja Karuppu

description: Vishnu is on his way to Chennai from Coimbatore to join a new company and meet his fiancee. However, his plan is jeopardised upon meeting Pavithra on a train, who is stuck in a problem.
star: Nakul, Nikesha Patel and Premgi Amaren

description: Jodhaa is a fiery Rajput princess who is obliged to marry Mughal Emperor Akbar for political reasons. Eventually, mutual respect and admiration between the duo leads to true love.
Karthik, an engineer, possesses precognition abilities and uses them to his advantage. But when he decides to use his abilities to earn money by gambling, he lands in trouble.
star: Gautham Karthik, Priya Anand, Vivek, Taapsee Pannu, Gayathri Raguram and Daniel Balaji

description: Murugesan, a man suffering from agoraphobia, holds his sister's marriage after a great struggle. However, his life turns upside down when his sister's husband starts causing trouble.
Lord Shiva tries to explain to Tamizh the importance of time in the life of an individual. Lord Shiva explains to him the scenario of kidnapping his girlfriend in three different time slots.
star: Arulnithi, Bindu Madhavi, Ashrita Shetty, and Bagavathi Perumal

description: The Hindu: The condescendingly titled Pongadi Neengalum Unga Kadhalum, directed and written by Ramakrishnan (who also plays the lead), is a difficult film to watch, leave alone review, for it is made for people still stuck in 1014 B.C.

Pattipulam is a 2019 Indian Tamil language comedy drama film written and directed by Suresh on his directorial debut. The film stars Veerasamar and Amitha Rao in the lead roles while Yogi Babu play supportive roles in the film.
An ex-convict and an IT professional develop a special bond when they live as neighbours. Later, due to family pressure and the nature of his work, they get caught up with their own lives.
Jeeva, an innocent youngster, falls in love with Priya, who comes from a wealthy family. Things turn upside down when Jeeva's father is murdered and they both set out to find the killer.
star: Karthi, Kajal Aggarwal, Jayaprakash and Soori

description: Rocket Raja, a small-time thief, comes across a young girl who calls him father. As Raja finds the truth about the girl's past, he turns a vigilante to take on notorious criminals.
star: Karthi playing dual roles, Tamannaah and Santhanam

description: A young, carefree man saves the life of a woman and they eventually fall in love. Their families object to their union, forcing the two of them to elope together.
Veeran Muthu Raku is an tamil action - romantic movie direction by Rajasekaran and produced by Shanmugam.

Vaalu is a 2015 Indian Tamil-language romantic action comedy film written and directed by debutant Vijay Chander. The film features Silambarasan and Hansika Motwani in the lead roles, with Santhanam, VTV Ganesh and Brahmanandam portraying supporting roles.
Three ardent fans of a superstar spend all their earnings to promote his films. When the trio turn to their star for help, they meet the unexpected, which leads to a game of revenge.
star: Shiva, Power star Srinivasan and Naina Sarwar

description: Two rival groups of adolescents from Holy Bells School engage in occasional tiffs. An unfortunate incident takes place before an athletics tournament which consequently changes their perception.

Vanna Jigina is a 2015 Tamil drama film, written and directed by Nandha Periyasamy. The film stars Vijay Vasanth and Sanyathara in the lead roles while Singampuli, Ravi Mariya and Ashwin Raja among others form an ensemble cast
Aravind and Divya separate soon after their wedding. But he tries to win his estranged wife back when she approaches him for divorce after three years of separation.
star: Jiiva, Kajal Aggarwal, Bobby Simha and Sunaina

description: Sathya, an honest policeman, accidentally loses his service pistol while tailing a criminal. However, the thief who stole the pistol sells it to Murthy and he goes on a killing spree.
star: Vetri, Aparna Balamurali, Nassar and M. S. Bhaskar.

description: A young boy after seeing his mother dead runs away and is later recruited by a gangster. On becoming the right-hand man of his boss, he makes serious enemies and everyone starts targeting him.
Anbu, who is on friendly terms with Karuna, a gangster, saves his life from a police officer. Soon, a turn of events put Anbu's life at risk, as he becomes the target of both the police and Karuna.
star: Vimal, Samuthirakani and Punnagai Poo Gheetha, and Philip Sheetal

description: Nadiya tries to kill herself when she is separated from Pandi, her lover. However, when a lookalike of Pandi saves her, she is shocked to learn that he is not the man she loves.
star: Vikram Prabhu, Nikki Galrani and Bindu Madhavi.

description: Ramesh wakes up with a hangover and remembers that he called a female escort to help get over his ex-girlfriend. However, things get complicated after the escort mysteriously dies.
Dinesh makes an MMS of his neighbour Aarti's private moments and circulates it amongst his friends. When Aarti tries to go to the police, Dinesh attacks her but Jyoti, a maid, saves her.
An overprotective father, Raghuraman, meets his biggest nightmare after his only daughter, Abhi, falls in love and decides to leave their house forever.
Maari, a fun-loving rowdy, creates many enemies in his area due to his arrogant but righteous behaviour. Beeja, a dreaded gangster, vows to seek revenge against Maari for killing his brother.
A respected martial arts expert finds himself in a spot during an inter-village competition that not only the pride of his community but threatens his life.
star: Gautham Karthik, Napoleon and Priya Anand

description: The members of a family join hands to save their ancestral tea shop from being demolished, even after receiving various threats from the government.
Kaashmora, a fraudster, gets locked inside a haunted bungalow, along with his family. The house has many ghosts who will only let the family leave if they fulfil their wishes.
star: Karthi, Nayanthara, Sri divya and Vivek

description: A set of circumstances makes Vasu, a moneylender, save the life of a policeman, Sivaraman Nayak. But that only leads to Vasu appearing on the radar of a gangster and contract killer, Singana Patrudu.
star: Vishal, Shruthi Haasan, Sathyaraj, Raadhika, Mukesh Tiwari, and Soori

description: Siva is a hardworking fisherman whose brother, Ashok, is a notorious lawyer and womaniser. When he kills a girl, Siva drags him to court. However, Ashok uses his skills to get himself out.
star: Jiiva, Divya Spandana and Honey Rose

description: After many attempts, Arjun meets don Ramana and asks him to surrender to the cops since that is the only condition on which Anjana will marry Arjun. When Ramana refuses, Arjun comes up with a plan.
Paari is a kind-hearted man who goes about doing good deeds and tries to help everyone he meets. He moves to Chennai in order to earn a good living and also ends up falling in love with Madhi.
Guru hatches several plans to separate Priya and her lover Thirukumaran. However, each time Thirukumaran successfully manages to escape from Guru's evil plans and traps him in another problem.
GK, a powerful criminal in touch with anti-national forces, is handicapped by Ranjith, a policeman. As GK tries to punish Ranjith and his kin, Ranjith's brother Giri, a loafer, comes to their aid.
Azhagappan gets an opportunity to visit heaven and hell. When he notices that several atrocities are being committed in hell, he decides to tamper with the laws of life and death.
Four friends meet a person during a trip who predicts their future by giving them a newspaper to be printed four months later. They work hard to make the prediction come true.
star: Sivakarthikeyan, Hansika Motwani, Vamsi Krishna and Sathish

description: SK, an aspiring actor, falls in love with Kavya, a doctor. However, she is engaged to another man and SK tries to sabotage their relationship by making her fall for him.
Mantra, an orphan, lives happily as a paying guest with an old couple. When some thieves break into the house and attempt to kill her, she learns an eerie truth about the family she is staying with.
Vasuki, a Kathakali artist, decides to take revenge against her neighbours who raped her. Since she is afraid to inform her husband, she seeks the assistance of DCP Jeena Bhai to kill the rapists.
Villagers start contemplating about their life after a powerful meteor is predicted to hit their village. Amidst this, two stepbrothers increase their rivalry while their daughters explore love.
Lingesan is a handsome and successful model. But his life changes forever when he develops a hunchback due to an injection and decides to avenge his situation.
Ambikapathy lands in Chennai with many aspirations but ends up becoming a peddler on Marina beach. He faces many obstacles but manages to work towards his goals.

Pencil is a 2016 Indian Tamil school-based mystery thriller film written and directed by debutant Mani Nagaraj and produced by S. P. Ragavesh. The film is based on South Korean film 4th Period Mystery released in 2009. The film features G. V.
Enticed by the opening of a new pizza shop in their locality, two young brothers from a slum yearn to taste a slice of pizza. They decide to go and get a pizza but get shooed away by the watchman.
Maryan goes to work in an oil company in Sudan to pay back the loans of his uncle. While on his way back, he and his co-workers are held hostage by terrorists.
After realising the danger of a bio-weapon, a scientist wants to protect it from being misused. The vial accidentally reaches India, and he must race against time to prevent a potential disaster.
Karthik falls in love with Archana, who has hearing and speech impairment, only to realise that she does not feel the same about him. Therefore, he feels heartbroken.
star: Prithviraj, Prakash Raj, Jyothika, and Swarnamalya

description: After being dumped on his wedding day, Shiva moves to another city where he falls in love with Sandhya. However, she does not love Shiva and gets engaged to Pratap.
Kathir, a youth from a poor family, and Shweta, a rich girl, meet in college and fall in love with each other. However, the two of them do not confess their love for each other.
Twin brothers, Vasu and Vel, are separated in their childhood. They reunite after growing up and decide to switch their identities to fight a corrupt politician, Sakkarapandi.
Kundavi, brought up in a small village gets married to Goutham. They have a 5 year old daughter Ishu. When Goutham goes to New York, Kundavi learns about Goutham's past love.
Surya, an NSG official, is on a mission to rescue someone when he gets the news of his father's demise. He starts reminiscing about the bond he shared with his father and the stories related to him.
star: Suriya, Simran, Divya Spandana and Sameera Reddy

description: The depiction of the epic story of the Ramayana, which enlightens the humans about the duties of relationships.
